lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hello, welcome! Oh hi hi [name]! Is there something you need today?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hi again! [Giggle] Seeing you makes me happy! How have you been?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: You met Frog-gege? Hehe, he's super duper nice right? Bullfrog's my big brother! I love him very much!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Sorrel used to work on a ship, did you know? He's my other big brother! He likes giving me things, hehe!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Zane is super duper reliable! He works here too. Look at these eggs! They're huge! I've never seen eggs this big before!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Have you been to the police station before? Gabe-gege works there! He read Treasure Planet with me once!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Sina showed me his dress for Silver Night once! It was super duper pretty! He's real talented, I love him lots!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I've never made much crafts before, but Sou showed me how to make paper stars once! He's like a little brother to me, hehe

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Some of the things don't grow here, so I have to put in an order through the Trading Post! You should go sometime, if you need something!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: The fire station guys are all super duper dedicated! I cook for them sometimes. Because they deserve it! Oh - come on by if you want food!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Wander likes to set up in random places! I think he sells maps? Would be useful if you're going up the mountain...Anyway, sometimes it's hard to find him, but I love bringing food to him!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Thank you for your purchase! Enjoy!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hehe, I hope you like it! Do come again!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Ooooh thank you! I've got plenty of uses for this I'm sure! Thank you for your items!

after trading 2 [probably soil that trig.key: after trading 2 [probably soil that triggers this but feel free to add!!]

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Um...t-thanks? Oh! No no it's nothing bad I just--hmm...how do I...how do I use this....

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Oh my stars! Please, come in come in! You'll get wet out there!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hi [name]! It's such nice weather out, huh? After I close up, I wanna wander around town and enjoy the sun for a bit!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: It's a little hot today! Reminds me of home sometimes...oh! Do come in, it's cooler in here! Hmm...Quingees don't sweat do they?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hmm the clouds are a bit gray today...please take care out there!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Wahhh why are you out on a day like this? You're so tiny you might fly away! Come in come in, wait it out first!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Uuu...I don't like stormy weather...it's cold and noisy...here, I'll make a cup of warm teh tarik for you okay?

meeting Quingee for the first time.key: meeting Quingee for the first time

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Oh! [blink] I didn't expect a Quingee in my store! Where's your owner? Wait - you're here to buy something?!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Hehe welcome back! What would you like today?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I never thought a Quingee would come so often, but here you are! Hehe, what do you need?

after Quingee makes decent progress up t.key: after Quingee makes decent progress up the mountain

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Wow!! It must be real hard huh, especially with how small you are! Come on in, rest your feet a bit!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Uwahhh congratulations!! The trek must be super duper tiring right? Here, come in - I'll make something to celebrate!

after receiving a gift you like.key: after receiving a gift you like

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Whooaaa!!! Thank you very much! I'll treasure this!

after receiving a gift you like 2.key: after receiving a gift you like 2

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Really? For me? Thank you so, soooo much!

after receiving a gift you don't like.key: after receiving a gift you don't like

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Uh. Um. Hmm. T-Thanks?

after receiving a gift you're neutral ab.key: after receiving a gift you're neutral about

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Oh thank you very much! I'm sure I can do something with this!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I...I gotta ask. Can you really swim? Someone told me you're sea chickens and I really wanna know!

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: I've made many friends while I've been here! Like Cam, Mallory, Tomoko, Naci, Apelsin, Ambrose, Legretta, Elodie, Hiraya, Esther -- Oh! You'll be my friend too, right?

lines.name: Pan Qing
lines.text: Can Quingees take spicy? Would it be too hot for you...? Hmm........
